decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s); 01 (Existing and proposed ground floor plan), 02 (Existing and proposed first floor plan), 03 (Proposed ground floor plan), 04 (Existing and proposed loft plan), 05 (Existing and proposed roof plan), 06 (Existing and proposed front elevation), 07 (Existing and proposed rear elevation), 08 (Existing and proposed side elevation)  & 09 (Existing and proposed section)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, in the interest of proper planning.
| Notwithstanding the details shown on the approved plans, all external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building on this site.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surrounds, in accordance with polices 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan (2013), policies 1.1 (g) and 1.2 (f) of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policy D4of the London Plan (2021)

| Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2016 (as amended) (or any subsequent amendment or new Order), no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the buildings.

Reason: To protect residential amenity in accordance with policies 1.1, 1.2 & 3.8 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policy D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021). | No part of the roof of the extensions shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason:  To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7.4, and 7.B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and policy D4 of the London Plan (2021).
